name: Baby Xylophone With Kids Songs
description:
Introduce your child to the world of music with this colorful baby xylophone! A true musical delight for your little one's amusement!

The colorful xylophone keeps the little one engaged for hours! It features nice background music, which can be alternated with sing along nursery rhymes. Simple, smooth animations helps the little mind to be curious at all times!

Features of this xylophone app include:

- Multi-touch keys adds it to the fun
- Smooth animations both on screen and hidden to be found by the little minds.
- Bright and Colorful screen!
- Beautiful Sound including popular nursery rhymes pre-loaded!
- Universal App Compatible with all your devices - iPhone, iPad and iPod

Stay tuned! And please let us know if you have any suggestions for improvement.

You definitely do not want to miss this cute little app. Give it a try now!
